sentences.en: Acute respiratory insufficiency in the postoperative patient may be caused by defective ventilation.
sentences.cn: 手术后病人的急性呼吸功能不全,可因不足的通气所引起.

sentences.en: Also called adrenal insufficiency or hypocortisolism, Addison's disease occurs in all age groups and affects both sexes.
sentences.cn: 阿狄森氏病也称肾上腺机能不足症或低皮质醇症，该病可以在各年龄组群中出现且男女都可发病。

sentences.en: Also called adrenal insufficiency or hypocortisolism, Addison's disease occurs in all age groups and affects both sexes. Addison's disease can be life-threatening.
sentences.cn: 阿狄森氏病也称肾上腺机能不足症或低皮质醇症，该病可以在各年龄组群中出现且男女都可发病。阿狄森氏病可危及患者生命。

sentences.en: Among assertive, learned, or eloquent people, she seemed to feel her dowdiness and insufficiency.
sentences.cn: 在这群过分自信, 学识渊博, 伶牙俐齿的人中间, 她总仿佛觉得自己过于懒散,笨头笨脑的.

sentences.cn: 最后得出本文的研究结论和不足.

sentences.cn: 找到公司目前业务流程的缺陷,并提供改进建议.

sentences.en: Hypertension and renal insufficiency and portal hypertension are common clinical manifestations.
sentences.cn: 高血压、肾功能不全及门静脉高压是常见的临床症状.

sentences.en: Internal construction agriculture production and promotion system exist insufficiency and problem.
sentences.cn: 农林生产和农业推广体系内部建设存在的不足和问题.

sentences.en: It is this combination that results in post - traumatic renal insufficiency.
sentences.cn: 在创伤后,这些因素的综合作用即可导致肾功能不足.

sentences.cn: 方法:对97例心脏瓣膜手术的患者予以TEE术中监测.

sentences.en: Preoperative pulmonary insufficiency represents a critical problem.
sentences.cn: 手术前肺功能不全成为一关键问题.

sentences.en: The insufficiency of resources has interfered with the economic development.
sentences.cn: 资源不足已经阻碍了经济的发展.

sentences.en: The shortage in net weight of delivered cargo was due to insufficiency of originally dispatched weight.
sentences.cn: 到货净重短少，系原发货重量不足所致。

sentences.en: The shortage is due to insufficiency of the original shipping weight.
sentences.cn: 这次短重是由于装船时的重量不足引起的.

sentences.en: The sleep insufficiency is primary factor that causes weary drive.
sentences.cn: 睡眠不足是造成疲劳驾驶的主要因素.

sentences.en: Valvular heart disease, usually aortic and mitral insufficiency, can complicate a variety of systemic diseases.
sentences.cn: 瓣膜性心脏病, 以主动脉瓣及二尖瓣闭锁不全为最常见, 可使各种全身性疾病变得复杂.
